ModMetaData.name: Raid and Event Manager
ModMetaData.author: No Way Jose
ModMetaData.description:
Contains a mod menu to toggle several different raid strategies, arrival types, and incidents.
Uses XML Extensions's menus. Access the menu through the "Plus (+)" sign next to "Mod Options" button in the settings.
Includes toggles to: 1. Disable Breaching Raids! 2. Disable Sapping Raids! 3. Disable Siege Raids! 4. Disable Drop Pod Raids! 5. Disable Infestations! 6. Disable Mech Clusters! 7. Disable Blight and ZZZTT! 8. And much much more!
